welcome_message_body: Welcome to Boadilla del Monte! This charming town is known for its beautiful parks, historic architecture, and vibrant local culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Boadilla del Monte has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Barajas Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights and some low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal of Barajas Airport, mainly used for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The largest terminal of Barajas Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4S
terminals.description: A satellite terminal connected to Terminal 4, mainly used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may require registration or have time limits.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrejon AFB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Torrejon AFB Airport, primarily used for military and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
